fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Environment, Taxation, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Given my family history linked to the agricultural world, I work with farmers in my region to make them understand the specific opportunities made available by the European community. I organize meetings and information meetings on events and events and bidding related to the agricultural world.
goals__remit:
Organize informative meetings between Italian citizens and Italian companies and European institutions on the opportunities offered by the European Union for growth and development. 
Given my family history linked to the agricultural world, I work with farmers in my region to make them understand the specific opportunities made available by the European community. I organize meetings and information meetings on events and events and bidding related to the agricultural world.
